name: MAP
description: Plugin that reads intersection geometry from a configuration file and publishes a J2735 MAP message.

messageTypes.description: Full geometric layout of the intersection.

configuration.description: The frequency to send the MAP message in milliseconds.
Map Plugin Log Level controls which log statements are printed to the terminal.

Name of the log file for this plugin. If a relative path is provides, this file will create a directory under /var/log/<PluginName> and add the file here. Not including this parameter or setting to (-) will direct log output to stdout which is the default behavior. NOTE: File logging for plugins should only be used for temporary data collection. Current file logging does not have mechanisms to purge data after a certain time or size.
JSON data defining a list of map files. One map file for each action set specified by the TSC.
